uav.generic.hardware.sensors

Class Barometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uav.generic.hardware.sensors.Barometer

  • public class Barometer
extends java.lang.Object
    The class models the drone barometer (relative altitude, absolute altitude).
    Since:
    version 2.0.0
